question:
Chris thrives on hiking. Rice exults sketching. Rafael dotes parkour. Talha favors filmmaking. Dougal welcomes watering the garden. Oran adores the color brown. John-Paul eschews parrots. Turki brushes off lasagna. Beau champions foxes. Rayan finds fulfillment in limousines. Manuel is partial to the color taupe. Ruaraidh is keen on the color navy. Rhys-Bernard lusts after playing baseball. Eren adores DJing. Niraj fancies racing cars. Cameron damns submarines. Alec accepts vacuuming the floor. Hubert stomachs the color tan. Mason is keen on playing video games. Alexzander gripes about writing poetry. Maxim enjoys guacamole. Konnor abhors botany. Su craves french fries. Micheal can’t bear the color eggplant. Rhoridh revels in whales. Sorley loves sheep. Mueez spurns the color peach. Doire esteems playing badminton. Ashton welcomes sculpting. Isaiah dismisses jazz dancing. Taylor-Jay disapproves of trucks. Valery celebrates writing journals. Erencem sneers at stargazing. Brendon commends playing soccer. Otto celebrates landscape photography. Koby disdains dolphins. Johansson rails against recycling. Codi finds joy in linguistics. Ghyll stomachs trucks. Alessandro exults in wolves. Fionn endures blogging. Jaden accepts the color red. Jai-Rajaram puts up with visiting theme parks. Arlo is passionate about electric bikes. Gurthar fancies history. 
Who sneers at stargazing? Reply with a name enclosed within triple angle brackets, like <<<name>>>.
